page.title: 08Honey
page.content: The only place employing a number of people in the village is the local honey factory. About 20 persons are employed in blending, bottling and packaging honey, much of which is sold in the larger supermarekt chains as well as to Health food shops. Golden syrup and molasses are also botteld in the factory. Honey is imported from all over the world, Mexico, China, New Zealand and many other countries. At the factory it is cleaned, purified and blended before being despatched to its various destinations.
